customer_reviews.text: I seem to have a hard time with finding good serums that truly hydrate my face and do not irritate my very sensitive skin. So far this is the best one I've found. I was pleasantly surprised because this one is $10+ dollars cheaper than the previous ones I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 2 years and will continue to do so. It is the first thing I apply to my face in the morning and the next to last thing I apply at night, under my regular moisturizer. I am about to turn 60 and actually live in my skin and remain physically active outdoors (golf, biking, kayaking). I have glowing and healthy age appropriate wrinkled skin!! No miracles, just really good stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly K

customer_reviews.title: Derma E has another winner for sensitive, reactive skin!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive, reactive skin, you'll probably love this. I've only had it a few days but my skin is calmer & more hydrated. The Derma E products usually work well for me & this is no exception. Definite reorder. Exellent value & arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go-to base facial lotion
customer_reviews.text: I've been using DermaE for years and it has yet to disappoint me. One bottle will last for anywhere from 1-2 months at a time, even if you tend to put on more like I do. A little goes a long way. I like how this formula leaves my skin hydrated without feeling greasy. I do use it as a base layer, though, and layer additional moisturizers on top to help repair my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Carly L.

customer_reviews.title: Hate new formula
customer_reviews.text: Wish they wouldn't have changed the formula. It has a stronger fragrance also! It gave me a rash. The older version was a staple for me. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Knee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to start out and say--- this is not the best hyaluronic acid I've used-- I used to use clarityrx daily dose of water, but I needed to find a more affordable substitute. I've used one other brand that didn't match up, and this moisturizer is the best bang for your buck. My skin stays hydrated all day, considering I have dry skin. I'm definitely transitioning to this product for the long haul. My only complaint is the scent. It doesn't bother me, but I think the company can do with out. Overall-- great product.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Derma E especially their Hydrating oil, but since they discontinued it I've been trying similar items. The serum is light and fresh and paired with the moisture mist it's a great combination. It doesn't replace the Hydrating Oil but is great for summer when you want something light and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Valium Surfer

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff for your face
customer_reviews.text: The best stuff! Goes on like silk and really hydrates my sensitive fair skin. Lightly scented.
customer_reviews.author: deanna l wilson

product_meta.description: Bathe skin in the hydration it needs for a healthy-looking glow. DERMA E’s Hydrating Serum with Hyaluronic Acid drenches the complexion with moisture so it feels incredibly soft and smooth. We have designed this to be the best vegan hyaluronic acid hydrating serum available, with a formulation featuring skin-loving nutrients that boost the skin’s overall appearance. When skin is well-hydrated, the appearance of lines and wrinkles is diminished and the complexion has a more even tone and texture. A hydrating serum with hyaluronic acid—nature’s moisture magnet—is vital in creating this type of beautiful skin that looks plumper and feels firmer. DERMA E’s hyaluronic acid serum can infuse skin with the intense hydration it needs to look revived and rejuvenated. Because our hydrating skin serum is lightweight enough for use day or night, it ensures skin gets the moisture it needs to look good around the clock. DERMA E’s Hydrating Serum with Hyaluronic Acid is fantastic on its own, or it can be paired with a moisturizer to take its effectiveness to an entirely new level. This serum is a valuable addition to any skin care routine, especially for complexions prone to dryness.
